thread.title: KHM Travel Group Introduces New Basecamp Program
thread.title_full: KHM Travel Group Introduces New Basecamp Program

author: KHM Travel Group
title: KHM Travel Group Introduces New Basecamp Program
text: KHM Travel Group: By Email RSS Feeds: KHM Travel Group Introduces New Basecamp Program Host travel agency creates program for agents who need a boost reaching the Pinnacle Elite Agent Program. Brunswick, OH, July 23, 2015 --( PR.com )-- KHM Travel Group's Pinnacle Elite Agent Program provides top-producing agents with numerous perks, and now the organization is launching an initiative to help agents get to that prestigious level. Basecamp assists agents who have reached the $50,000 revenue threshold enter the Pinnacle Elite Agent Program, which begins at the $100,000 level.As soon as a KHM Travel Group Agent produces $50,000 in traveled commissionable sales in a calendar year, they are automatically enrolled into Basecamp. With Basecamp, agents receive additional training and opportunities to earn extra money. Basecamp agents also receive access to exclusive webinars, as well as a monthly e-newsletter with sales tips, supplier information and opportunities to earn additional commission.The program was designed to assist agents in their quest to reach Pinnacle Elite status, where even more perks are waiting."The response to Basecamp has been amazing so far. The innovative tools we've provided our agents are helping them grow their businesses and get excited about reaching new goals," said National Training Director Marie Smith.Currently, there are 168 agents in Basecamp, with more being added every month.For more information about KHM Travel Group and the Basecamp program, visit www.khmtravel.com.
